name: Anabella pump
description:
State: used but in good condition
Annabella is the only breast pump in the world that simulates the act of breastfeeding a baby and produces more milk in less time!
A single-sided breast pump with two blades, a closed system, portable and rechargeable.
Annabella imitates the tongue action that babies do while sucking. The pump's tongue action encourages the production of the hormones prolactin and oxytocin, thus increasing milk production and releasing it naturally and helping to create a pleasant pumping experience almost like breastfeeding.
The Annabella breast pump includes a soft silicone-wrapped breast shield and an adjustable size (ranging from 18 mm to 24 mm) to ensure maximum comfort during use. With 9 suction levels and 9 tongue speeds, Annabella also includes a night-time pumping light ring, making it easier for mothers to establish a pumping routine even at night. The BPA-free bottle holds up to 140 ml of milk and is safe and easy to assemble, dishwasher safe and refrigerator safe
